Frame.Nav: 180-degree-swing doors open flat to side of cab for easy access to and exit from the cab.
Superior view to heel of blade allows operator to better gauge material flow.

Numerous undercarriage options are available to match the machine to job-site conditions, including Long Track, Wide Track and Low Ground Pressure versions. The optional Case Extended Life Track (CELT) undercarriage provides outstanding durability and extended life even in abrasive conditions.
Narrow dashboard increases visibility to blade and work site.
Convenient swing-out grill and side panels provide quick access to all routine maintenance points, making K Series dozers easy to maintain.

Blade widths on the 650K, 750K and 850K XLT range from 98 inches (2489 mm) to 130 inches (3302 mm). These choices provide another opportunity to match the machine to the job. While a narrower blade is most efficient when working in close spaces, using a wider blade increases productivity in open areas.
The luxurious cab features Air-Ride seat, panoramic tinted glass, high-capacity heater/air conditioner, low-effort controls and plenty of legroom.
Blade pitch can be easily adjusted with no-tools from a maximum 52 degrees forward and 60 degrees rearward by removing a clip pin. No additional tools are needed.
Front and rear work lights improve visibility on the job site.

K Series dozers can be equipped with a parallelogram high-clearance ripper to tackle packed, frozen or rocky soils. The ripper can be equipped with three to five shanks that will penetrate up to 14 inches. The dozers can also be outfitted with winches.
Side-wing doors allow quick and easy access to daily check points.
PowerStat hydrostatic drive gives the dozer more power to each track through beefy drive motors.
Industry-exclusive easy-tilt cab/ROPS platform allows for quick access to the power train.

Nav.SubTitle: Angled track frame keeps undercarriage clean

Frame.Nav: 49-degrees sloping track frame cover and ample space between the track and machine make it easy to keep the K Series free of dirt, rocks and debris.</
K Series dozers feature field-proven, economical Case engines ranging from 81 to 96 horsepower that have excellent fuel economy at 2.3 to 2.5 gallons per hour.
K Series dozers range from 75 to 96 horsepower and provide excellent fuel economy - 2.2 to 2.5 gallons per hour.
K Series dozers feature isolation-mounted hydrostatic pumps and motors that provide superior power to each track.
